#my-own-repo-web-interface howto

= Installation =

Place php-files into web server dir, pm-file into /usr/lib/my-own-repo-web-interface/, pl-file into /usr/bin/my-own-repo-update.

= Configuration =
All you need is edit config.php to change path to sqlite db file.

= Usage =

Init db with:
my-own-repo-update --init pacman /srv/my-own-repo/myrepo.db /home/user/pkgs

Place following command into cron:

my-own-repo-update pacman /srv/my-own-repo/myrepo.db /home/user/pkgs

That is all. Now you can browse http://your-server.tld/my-own-repo/search.php
